## Session Description

This week is devoted to individual advising and independent work. There are no course sessions scheduled for today. You should use this time to continue working on your final project.

## Before Class

Professor Greenlee has extended availability for office hours appointments. If you have not already scheduled an appointment and wish to, please [sign up](https://calendly.com/agreen4/neighborhood-analysis?back=1&month=2021-01) for an advising appointment.
